footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Jahoda | Update Date: 01/20/2026 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Elegy for the End__
Best support bow, providing EM and ATK%

__Favonius Warbow__
Energy generation for the rest of the team, and guaranteed to be given at the beginning of the game.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Snare Hook, Rainbow Serpent’s Rain Bow, End of the Line__
4-star alternatives that provide little benefit in comparison to Favonius Warbow.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge% or ATK%|<goblet> ATK%|<circlet> Healing Bonus% or ATK% or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Hidden Aces: Seven Tools of the Hunter
**2)** Elemental Skill: Savvy Strategy: Splitting the Spoils
**N/A)** Normal Attack: Strike While the Arrow’s Hot

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: __Deepwood Memories__ and __Instructors__ work fine as well, depending on the team she's played in.
